review.reviewBody: when im craving butter chicken ,rice and nann bread ... here is my go to ! very yummy delicious
worst roti, goat curry and gheer I had ever had ...... water of money.....

Nirvana is my spot for butter chicken I always order it with veggie samosas but the butter chicken lacked chicken usually it's chicken chunks but my order seemed like the chicken was tiny and less chicken then I would get from nirvana when the butter chicken is in chunks  but the samosas were great as always
